laazotea.indi.client

Class INDIBLOBProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • laazotea.indi.client.INDIProperty
      • laazotea.indi.client.INDIBLOBProperty

  • public class INDIBLOBProperty
extends INDIProperty
    A class representing a INDI BLOB Property.

    It implements a listener mechanism to notify changes in its Elements.

    Version:
    1.36, November 17, 2013
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]

    • Constructor Detail

      • INDIBLOBProperty

        protected INDIBLOBProperty(org.w3c.dom.Element xml,
                INDIDevice device)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs an instance of INDIBLOBProperty. INDIBLOBPropertys are not usually directly instantiated. Usually used by INDIDevice.
        Parameters:
        xml - A XML Element <defBLOBVector> describing the Property.
        device - The INDIDevice to which this Property belongs.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the XML Property is not well formed (for example if the Elements are not well formed).

    • Method Detail

      • update

        protected void update(org.w3c.dom.Element el)
        Description copied from class: INDIProperty
        Updates the values of its elements according to some XML data. Subclasses of INDIProperty must implement this method to really do the parsing and update (usually calling update(Element, String)).
        Specified by:
        update in class INDIProperty
        Parameters:
        el - A XML Element <setXXXVector> to which the property must be updated.
        See Also:
        INDIProperty.update(Element, String)

      • getDefaultUIComponent

        public INDIPropertyListener getDefaultUIComponent()
                                           throws laazotea.indi.INDIException
        Description copied from class: INDIProperty
        Gets a default UI component to handle the repesentation and control of this Property. The panel is registered as a listener of this Property. Please note that the UI class must implement INDIPropertyListener. The component will be chosen depending on the loaded UI libraries (I4JClientUI, I4JAndroid, etc). Note that a casting of the returned value must be done. If a previous default component has been requested, the previous one will be deregistered. So, only one default component will listen for the property.
        Specified by:
        getDefaultUIComponent in class INDIProperty
        Returns:
        A UI component that handles this Property.
        Throws:
        laazotea.indi.INDIException

      • getElement

        public INDIBLOBElement getElement(java.lang.String name)
        Gets a particular Element of this Property by its name.
        Overrides:
        getElement in class INDIProperty
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Element to be returned
        Returns:
        The Element of this Property with the given name. null if there is no Element with that name.
